did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Iuschenko, Aleksandr Ivanovich. The Physical Basis of Mental Diseases and their Biologic-Chemical Examinations

address.addressline: Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center

did.abstract: Typed, carbon copy translation of Iuschenko's work on mental disease. Translated into English by Dr. Bayard Holmes, based upon the German translation of Iuschenko's original Russia text. Includes typed bibliography and index of names, with holograph subject index.

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Iuschenko, Aleksandr Ivanovich, The Physical Basis of Mental Diseases and their Biologic-Chemical Examinations, Crerar Ms 83, Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: Typed, carbon copy translation of Iuschenko's work on mental disease. Translated into English by Dr. Bayard Holmes, based upon the German translation of Iuschenko's original Russia text. Includes typed bibliography and index of names, with holograph subject index. Inscribed with an editorial note by Bayard Holmes, Chicago, April 1915. Copied by Bayard Holmes. Bound in brown cloth.
